data.title: Let the community name that song!
data.meta_description: Have a tune stuck in your head but no idea what song it is? Hum it, sing it, upload it, and let the people identify it for you!
data.text:
Have you ever found yourself wondering: "What's that song?!" Perhaps you can recall only a snippet of it or a few faint words from the lyrics, but you're eager to discover the band or singer behind that elusive tune.

Fear not! Here at WatZatSong, we've got you covered. Our vibrant community of real 'hoomans' is ready to guess the song's name for you. All you need to do is upload a short sample of the song, and let our community take a crack at it, providing you with quick suggestions for the song title.

When no app works to name that song

Even if AI-driven apps like Shazam and SoundHound have failed to recognize the song name, there's a very good chance that among the thousands of users on our site at any given time, someone will pick up on it and find songs on YouTube or other audio/video platforms that match your enigmatic melody.

Some old tracks, rare tunes, remixed samples, and even covers of popular songs can be difficult to identify for software that relies on artificial intelligence. In these scenarios, you need a real person to recognize the artist who originally sang it.

An active community that can identify songs

We have a large community of over 500k members that can help you name that song that's been stuck in your head for so long. You can submit any song, hum it, or record it, and our passionate community will identify the title and often post YouTube/Spotify links so you can discover the singer.

WatZatSong is a trustworthy service that has been around for almost two decades, helping people name songs every day and keeping music fans entertained while discovering new tracks. There are engaging conversations in the comments section, filled with fun memories related to music that our members share on the site for everyone to enjoy.

At WatZatSong, we believe no algorithm will be able to find a song better than the human ear and memory. Our vibrant community names hundreds of samples every day, helping people find what that song is.

“What is that song” music discovery

Sooo… Do you have a song stuck in your head, leaving you wondering "what's that song?" The WatZatSong community will listen and tell you its name.

The songs playing around you might be the latest buzz that you're missing out on. So, it's better to know who's playing it and join the herd of people hooked on it. Music discovery can be a fun pastime and some consider it a cool hobby. Some of our loyal members have found thousands of matches already and have championed top member statuses over the years. Music connects people in ways other media cannot, and discovering new songs together as a community is fulfilling.

Multilingual music community

Our pages can be accessed in multiple languages. In addition to English, you can browse in French as well. Beyond these two languages, you'll find people from all over the world chatting about songs in many other languages too. So, don't be put off if the song you're looking for is in another language. The lyrics can be recognized by our members based in 100+ countries around the globe.

Come and join us, and let's find that song together!
